meanings.sent1: The fact that the sun rises every morning is unchallenged by most people.
meanings.sent2: Her unchallenged talent for painting brought her recognition in the art world.
meanings.sent3: The unchallenged rule of the queen made the kingdom a peaceful place.
meanings.sent4: His unchallenged dominance on the basketball court earned him the nickname 'The King'.
meanings.sent5: The unchallenged beauty of the sunset left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The proposal was unchallenged during the meeting and was accepted unanimously.
meanings.sent2: The team's unchallenged victory secured their spot in the finals.
meanings.sent3: The unchallenged decision to have pizza for dinner made everyone happy.
meanings.sent4: Her unchallenged leadership style inspired trust and loyalty among her team.
meanings.sent5: The unchallenged flow of the river symbolized peace and tranquility.

meanings.sent1: The unchallenged record set by the athlete remained unbroken for years.
meanings.sent2: The unchallenged statement in the report was taken as the final conclusion.
meanings.sent3: The unchallenged decision to cancel the event disappointed many attendees.
meanings.sent4: His unchallenged position as the CEO gave him the authority to make important decisions.
meanings.sent5: The unchallenged truth of the matter was finally revealed to everyone.
